SEARCH
Package model

Class Order

java.lang.Object
model.Order
public class Order extends Object
Represents an order in the system, containing details about the customer, order lines, payment method, and order state. This class manages the details of an order and allows for the calculation of the total order price.
Version:
0.1
Author:
DaniAndries

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Order(int id, Date orderDate, OrderLine orderLine, Client customer)
    Constructs an Order with a single order line, defaulting to pending state and unpaid method.
    Order(int id, Date orderDate, OrderState state, PaymentMethod paymentMethod, List<OrderLine> orderLines, Client customer)
    Constructs an Order with the specified parameters.
    Order(int id, Date orderDate, OrderState state, PaymentMethod paymentMethod, Client customer)
    Constructs an Order with the specified parameters, without initial order lines.
    Order(Date orderDate, OrderState state, OrderLine orderLine, Client customer)
    Constructs an Order with a single order line and a specific state, defaulting to unpaid method.

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order(int id, Date orderDate, OrderState state, PaymentMethod paymentMethod, List<OrderLine> orderLines, Client customer)
      Constructs an Order with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for this order
      orderDate - the date when the order was placed
      state - the current state of the order
      paymentMethod - the method used for payment
      orderLines - the list of order lines associated with this order
      customer - the customer who placed the order

    • Order

      public Order(int id, Date orderDate, OrderState state, PaymentMethod paymentMethod, Client customer)
      Constructs an Order with the specified parameters, without initial order lines.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for this order
      orderDate - the date when the order was placed
      state - the current state of the order
      paymentMethod - the method used for payment
      customer - the customer who placed the order

    • Order

      public Order(int id, Date orderDate, OrderLine orderLine, Client customer)
      Constructs an Order with a single order line, defaulting to pending state and unpaid method.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for this order
      orderDate - the date when the order was placed
      orderLine - the initial order line for this order
      customer - the customer who placed the order

    • Order

      public Order(Date orderDate, OrderState state, OrderLine orderLine, Client customer)
      Constructs an Order with a single order line and a specific state, defaulting to unpaid method.
      Parameters:
      orderDate - the date when the order was placed
      state - the current state of the order
      orderLine - the initial order line for this order
      customer - the customer who placed the order

      public void finalizeOrder(Payable payable, PaymentMethod paymentMethod)

      Parameters:
      payable - the payment strategy to use for the payment
      paymentMethod - the method used for payment

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Compares this order to another object for equality. Two Order objects are considered equal if they have the same order date, state, payment method, order lines, and associated customer.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - the object to compare to
      Returns:
      true if this order is equal to the specified object; false otherwise

      public int hashCode()
